examples: was eager to rejoin his fellows

definition: an equal in rank, power, or character : peer
examples: discussions among a group of fellows from the nearby Los Alamos National Laboratory

definition: a member of a group having common characteristics, a member of an incorporated literary or scientific society
examples: a fellow of the American College of Surgeons

definition: a person of one of the lower social classes

examples: He seems like a fine fellow.
She and her fellow went to the movies.

definition: an incorporated member of a college or collegiate foundation especially in a British university
a person appointed to a position granting a stipend and allowing for advanced study or research
